div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), Jan. 19, 1915. THE NORWEGIAN NATIONAL LEAGUE

body.p: The Norwegian National League held its annual meeting last evening. The president, George Kramer, gave their report for the past year.

Lasse Grundeland, Mrs. John Thye, and represented the League at the centennial festival in Christiania, Norway. The report of the treasurer showed the cash on hand, January 1, 1914, to be . The income from the Seventeenth of May festival was $3,302.75; other income for the year totaled $3,891.63. The year's expense amounted to $2,470.89; the cash on hand, January 1, 1915 was $3,250.99. The employment office had a deficit this year of $431.57.
